abstract.p: Accounts of two pharmaceutical brands being acquired by Pharmacia & Upjohn Inc from units of Johnson & Johnson have been awarded to W B Doner & Co; Doner is named to handle Micatin line of antifungal products, which had been handled by McCann-Erickson Worldwide; Doner is awarded Pediacare line of cough and cold products, which had been handled by Susan Spindler Advertising (S)

block.p: The accounts of two pharmaceutical brands being acquired by Pharmacia & Upjohn Inc. from units of Johnson & Johnson have been awarded to W. B. Doner & Company in Southfield, Mich., a roster agency of Pharmacia & Upjohn.

The accounts of two pharmaceutical brands being acquired by Pharmacia & Upjohn Inc. from units of Johnson & Johnson have been awarded to W. B. Doner & Company in Southfield, Mich., a roster agency of Pharmacia & Upjohn.

Doner was named to handle the Micatin line of antifungal products, which had been handled by the McCann-Erickson Worldwide unit of the Interpublic Group of Companies in New York. Though billings were not disclosed, Advertising Age estimated them at $9.5 million. Doner was also awarded the Pediacare line of cough and cold products for children, which had been handled by Susan Spindler Advertising in Weston, Conn. Billings were not disclosed.

The two brands were among several swapped last week by Pharmacia & Upjohn and Johnson & Johnson. Doner will lose the account of one brand, Motrin pain reliever, acquired by the McNeil Consumer Products unit of Johnson & Johnson from Pharmacia & Upjohn. Advertising Age, which estimated Motrin spending last year at $16.6 million, reported that Motrin might be shifted to Saatchi & Saatchi Health Care Connection, a unit of Cordiant P.L.C. in New York, or Ammirati Puris Lintas in New York, an Interpublic agency.
